name: Speedway Motors
overview: For more than four years I've been a vital part of maintaining the web platform. I've had a hand in developing the majority of pages on the site, the internal custom CMS, and many scheduled processes that support the company. My latest work includes: implementing a new checkout funnel with latest javascript technologies, building out services to calculate shipping quotes, taxes, and promotions, and gradually improving the in-house search algorithm.

name: My Wedding
about: Single page static website to provide information to guests of my wedding
overview: Single page, static site to provide information to guests such as, wedding location/time, reception location/time, engagement photos, gift registry, and rsvp.
Some features of the site are: parallax scrolling, clean image gallery, countdown timer, and rsvp form wired up to Netlify to avoid the need for a server.
